channel.title: Server Not Connecting Unless Localhost (not a normal problem like port forward.)
channel.description: I have set my server up and not even i can connect to it from my IP address. Ports forwarded - Yes Right IP/Port - Yes I don't know if the server is configured to only allow connections if it is local but not even i can connect from the ip. I really didn't want to make this topic and look like a noob but i had no other choice becuase i quit runescape servers ages ago and they used to work find ;[ Please, if you know the problem help me and i will try and reward you.

item.title: Server Not Connecting Unless Localhost (not a normal problem like port forward.)
item.dc:creator: @joe32717 joe32717
item.description:
@joe32717 wrote:

Nope my problem isnt fixed.
On some servers is there some sort of protection only allowing connections if the server ip they entered is 127.0.0.1 or localhost?

Read full topic
